there's something that you and your

very few people expected him to live

that's a pretty clean satisfying way to

absolutely want people to understand
that if they read his interviews and

I mean musically there would be a much
reduced sort of heavy rock and heavy

than that he was a man who proved that
you can be a proper proper rock star and
not lose your identity and not lose your

an awful lot of interesting things to
say and he was unapologetic and he was

really want people to remember about
